mapper.select: select count(corder.combin_type) as totalCount, combin_type as status from ope_combin_order corder where corder.dr = 0 group by corder.combin_type

select id as id, combin.combin_type as combinType, combin.combin_no as combinNo, combin.combin_status as combinStatus, combin.combin_qty as combinQty, combin.combin_start_date as combinStartDate, combin.combin_end_date as combinEndDate, combin.principal_id as principalId, combin.principal_name as principalName, combin.country_code as countryCode, combin.telephone as telephone, combin.remark as remark, combin.combin_type as classType from ope_combin_order combin where combin.dr=0 and combin.id=#{id}

select scooterb.id as id, scooterb.group_id as groupId, spgroup.group_name as groupName, scooterb.color_id as colorId, color.color_name as colorName, color.color_value as colorValue, 1 as productType, scooterb.scooter_bom_id as productId, scooterb.qty as qty, combin.combin_no as orderNo, bom.en_name as productName, bom.bom_no as productN from ope_combin_order_scooter_b scooterb left join ope_specificat_group spgroup on spgroup.id = scooterb.group_id and scooterb.dr = 0 left join ope_color color on color.id = scooterb.color_id and color.dr = 0 left join ope_combin_order combin on scooterb.combin_id = combin.id and combin.dr = 0 left join ope_production_scooter_bom bom on bom.id = scooterb.scooter_bom_id and bom.dr = 0 where scooterb.dr = 0 and scooterb.combin_id=#{id}

select combinB.id as id, combinB.combin_name as productName, combinB.combin_no as productN, combinB.production_combin_bom_id as productId, 2 as productType, combinB.qty as qty, combinB.combin_no as orderNo, combinBom.en_name as productName, combinBom.bom_no as productN from ope_combin_order_combin_b combinB left join ope_production_combin_bom combinBom on combinB.production_combin_bom_id = combinBom.id and combinBom.dr = 0 where combinB.dr = 0 and combinB.combin_id=#{id}

select * from ope_production_scooter_bom where dr = 0 and
( group_id=#{item.group_id} and color_id = #{item.color_id} and bom_status = 1)

select id as relationOrderId, combin_no as relationOrderNo from ope_combin_order where dr = 0 and combin_status in (70,80) and combin_type = #{enter.classType}
and combin_no like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%')
select combin_name, combin_no, production_combin_bom_id, qty as combinQty, qty as ableInWhQty from ope_combin_order_combin_b where dr = 0 and combin_id = #{enter.id}

select scooter.group_id, scooter.color_id, scooter.qty as combinQty, scooter.qty as ableInWhQty, group1.group_name AS groupName, color.color_value AS colorValue, color.color_name AS colorName from ope_combin_order_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group group1 on scooter.group_id = group1.id left join ope_color color ON color.id = scooter.color_id where scooter.dr = 0 and scooter.combin_id = #{enter.id}

select distinct bom.group_id as groupId, spgroup.group_name as groupName, 1 as productionType from ope_production_scooter_bom bom left join ope_specificat_group spgroup on bom.group_id = spgroup.id and spgroup.dr = 0 where bom.dr = 0 and bom.bom_status = 1

select distinct bom.color_id as colorId, color.color_name as colorName, color.color_value as colorValue, 1 as productionType from ope_production_scooter_bom bom left join ope_color color on color.id = bom.color_id and color.dr = 0 where bom.dr = 0 and bom.bom_status = 1 and bom.group_id=#{id}
select distinctrow en_name as combinName from ope_production_combin_bom bom where dr=0 and bom_status=1
select bom_no as bomNo, id as productionCombinBomId from ope_production_combin_bom bom where dr = 0 and bom_status = 1 and en_name = #{combinName}

select scooter.qty, group1.group_name AS groupName, color.color_name AS colorName from ope_combin_order_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group group1 on scooter.group_id = group1.id left join ope_color color ON color.id = scooter.color_id where scooter.dr = 0 and scooter.combin_id = #{combinId}
select combin.combin_name as productName, combin.combin_no as productN, combin.qty from ope_combin_order_combin_b combin where combin.dr = 0 and combin.combin_id = #{combinId}
